root: ^What is this place? It looks like a destroyed cottage?
^It's my home, well my old one... This is where I was raised before joining the group.
^Really? This seems so dreadful and dying, no flowers, no stone, not even a semblance of a house.
^Sadly you're right, this is what's left of it after my parents' death.
^What do you hope to do here? You won't live here on the ground I hope?
^I want to rebuild it someday, make it a real house you know, where me and my future partner can have a family.
^I see... but why show it to me?
^I wanted to show it to you, so you can come back someday and see that you can make a home from nothing! I want to adopt lots of kids who lost their parents, so they can have a family of their own!
^You are too sweet for this world Yuki... I hope... you and your future partners will be happy with that life, even if I don't understand that kind of family.
^Thanks Claire! I hope you and... your future partner will be happy in your noble life... Could... could...
^Never mind... just promise me you'll visit me here someday...
^I think I will yes... thanks for showing me this, Yuki...
^Well let's go back to the others.
^(Was she going to ask me something? I should talk to her about it... No if it was something important she would have told me.)
